full_summary:
===============

# Gun Range Rental Tender

## Description

 Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is looking to rent firearms range space for live fire training and requalification of Emergency Response Team Members and Trainers. This contract requires exclusive access to a firearms range facility with ten (10) shooting positions for 12 months of the year.

## Contract Details

* Acquisition Number: 21802-23-0160
* Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Contract End Date: March 31, 2026
* Expected Contract Value: $1,632,645.00
* Language of Work: English

## Scope of Work

The successful bidder will provide:

* Exclusive access to a firearms range facility for 12 months of the year
* A minimum of ten (10) shooting positions
* Secure on-site storage for training supplies
* Men's and women's washroom facilities
* A classroom area for training purposes
* Recycling of spent ammunition

## Requirements

* The range facility must be located within a 20-kilometer radius from Mission Institutions and the Matsqui Complex.
* The range facility must have access 12 months of the year, Monday to Friday, between 0730 and 1530.
* The range facility must provide a secure on-site storage area for training supplies.
* The range facility must have a classroom area for training purposes.
* The range facility must provide washrooms.

## Trade Agreements

* This procurement is subject to the Canadian Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* This procurement is subject to the Canada Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Closing Date and Time

* 22 March 2024, 2:00 pm Pacific Standard Time

## Contact Information

* Katie McKeever, Contract Officer
* CSC Procurement Office
* 33991 Gladys Avenue, unit 100, Abbotsford, BC, V2S 2E8
* Phone: 236-380-2294
* Email: [Katie.McKeever@CSC-SCC.GC.CA](mailto:Katie.McKeever@CSC-SCC.GC.CA)
